faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Web Development
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our web development services in Barcelona and the website creation process.

items.question: How long does it take to build a professional website?
items.answer: Website development time varies by complexity. A simple landing page takes 1-2 weeks, while a full e-commerce site may take 4-8 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation and keep you updated throughout the process.

items.question: What payment options do you accept for web development projects?
items.answer: We accept bank transfers, credit cards, and digital payments. Our standard payment structure is 50% upfront to begin development and 50% upon project completion. For larger projects, we offer flexible payment plans.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing website maintenance and support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive website maintenance packages that include regular updates, security monitoring, performance optimization, content updates, and technical support. This ensures your website remains secure, fast, and up-to-date.

items.question: Can you help with SEO and getting my website to rank on Google?
items.answer: Absolutely! All our websites include basic SEO optimization. We also offer advanced SEO services including keyword research, content optimization, local SEO for Barcelona businesses, and ongoing SEO maintenance to improve your Google rankings.
